text: Tomás Félix Villanueva Rodríguez (25 February 1953 - 7 September 2017) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Valladolid, Spain. He served as a politician for the region of Castile and León. He served as the region's Vice President from 2001 through 2003. Villanueva died of a heart attack on 7 September 2017 in Valladolid, Spain at the age of 64.Fallece el exvicepresidente de la Junta, Tomás Villanueva ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1953 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Spanish politicians Category:Vice presidents
title: Tomás Villanueva
